issue.title: Robot falls while carrying tools in habitat

content.raw:
I want to argue this has not been fixed. In fact I am running with the default tip and I am seeing it for the first time.

This was painful. An hour realtime into my run...  Apologise for not the best gif of the fall. but you can see the contact lines.

![optimised.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/1957720047-optimised.gif)
content.html:
